POtHS 3 - Bible Movies - 05 - The Jesus Movie for Kids






POtHS 3 - Bible Movies - 05 - The Jesus Movie for Kids


POtHS Comments on This one:   This is Excellent.


Discription

This review is from: The Jesus Movie: Read and Share DVD Bible - DVD[/size]

My 3.5 year old daughter absolutely LOVES this movie. We had talked a lot about Jesus before watching it, but not much about the crucifixion. This was a great introduction to it! We sat and watched the movie with her for the first few times, and she asked many questions during (and since). It's definitely gotten her thinking! It is perfect for preschoolers, as it is not a gory depiction of the crucifixion, yet gets the point across. I would definitely recommend it to anyone with toddle
